text: Balza () is a rural locality (a village) in Leninsky Selsoviet, Kuyurgazinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 142 as of 2010. There are 5 streets. == Geography == It is located 25 km from Yermolayevo, 12 km from Bugulchan. == References == Category:Rural localities in Kuyurgazinsky District
title: Balza, Kuyurgazinsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
